channel.title: Mejin's Open Table
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Mejin's Open Table

item.title: Somnific Vent
item.description: Overview A socketable item with 1 charge derived from a Somnific Pony. Once per day, when you make an attack you can spend the charge. When you do, your target makes a dc 13 con save or is stunned for one round.

item.title: Wand of Magic Missiles
item.description: Base Description This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the magic missile spell from it.

item.title: Somnific Pony
item.description: There was a monstrosity in the swamp near Flusstadt. It was definitely not natural. Hooves on a frog-like creature? With sleep gas? Wonder how it came to be… or why it was so close to the town.

item.title: Available Hirelings
item.description: About Hirelings Hirelings are NPCs who are available to aid players on their adventures at a cost. If you grow attached to a hireling they can be converted into a backup PC.

item.title: Languages
item.description: Language is a core part of how we experience the world and in Ausfallen it is no different. Below you will find a list of languages both common and uncommon and who is most likely to be found speaking them.

item.title: Boktatchi Nokozan
item.description: Overview A kobold nest hidden in the mountains east of Flusstadt. The kobolds here serve Shinchunou, mining the local copper as a primary source of riches for her horde.

item.title: Shinchunou
item.description: Shinchunou is an ancient brass dragon residing in the mountain’s near the academy. She is served by local Kobolds from Boktatchi Nokozan who provide her copper, food, and other goods; and in return she protects them and will bestow some of them a bit of her power.

item.title: Cadabear
item.description: Cadabears are a relatively recently discovered form of undead. The cadabear is more than an undead bear, it is heartier overall and relies on smell and sound rather than sight.

item.title: Vulpine Marker
item.description: Overview A socketable item with 1 charge. A subtle section of a vulpine inkling that it used when tracking its prey. When this item is socketed into a magic item it can spend its charge to cast Hunters Mark as a bonus action.
